_xResult.title: Crop Tank Top
_xResult.shortdesc: Softest bamboo tank available in eight colors
_xResult.longdesc:
Treat yourself to this super-comfortable tank top that you’ll want to wear every day. Wear it by itself or under a shirt or sweater. Made from smooth, natural bamboo fabric that is breathable and feels incredibly soft.

Bamboo has a soft, silky-cashmere feel and wicks away moisture due to its porous nature. Bamboo is also naturally anti-microbial, hypoallergenic and one of nature’s most sustainable resources; it’s 100% biodegradable, naturally regenerative and does not require the use of any pesticides or chemicals to grow.

Look beautiful and feel beautiful in this classic, timeless design. Made with love and care.

  • Scoop neck and modern-cropped length (but can be made to any length, please specify if you want it longer or shorter)

  • Designed with a slim fit that skims the body

  • The perfect combination with high waisted bottoms

  • Double fabric for 2X the protection

  • Bamboo fabric with 4-way stretch

  • Breathable, lightweight

  • Seamless finish

Fabric: Sustainable Bamboo Knit - Smooth, soft and light-weight. Bamboo knit is a sustainable fiber made from responsibly harvested bamboo.

Content: 95% Bamboo Rayon, 5% Elastane Spandex

Colors (in order from left to right on last photo): White, Parfait Pink, Soft Pink, Amethyst, Piscine, Lavender, Blue Chalk, Black

Model wears color White.
